DOC.brief_summary: To check the influence of injected platelet-rich plasma (PRP) on the healing of medial retinaculum and the redaction in recurrent dislocation of the patella.
DOC.brief_title: Platelet-rich Plasma (PRP) Treatment for Medial Retinaculum Tear Post Medial Patellar Dislocation
DOC.detailed_description: Autologous platelet-rich matrices may aid in the healing of ligaments & tendons by promoting and accelerating tissue healing because of the release of growth factors including transforming growth factor (TGF)-beta1 and platelet-derived growth factor (PDGF) from platelet alpha-granules.
DOC.criteria: age 1840 years old first time patella dislocation pregnancy mental or physical disabilities
DOC.keyword: medial retinaculum tear s/p patella dislocation
